text: Hello
Hi , how are you tonight ?
I am good. How are you?
I am fine  ,  Thank you .What are we working on here ?
I am asking you on the behalf of save the children charity to donate for the noble cause.
Where is the  charity  located ? where do they serve?
It is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Can we donate by  Paypal or how do we donate ?
Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
That is interesting , how has that been working out ? Are many people donating ?
Yes many people donate for this noble cause. We beleive that we people are the part of solution and every one of us has the moral responsibility to help.
I  have to agree with you.  Can I ask that my donation goes to a specific cause or country ?
We have several campaigns. Like Educate a Girl. In this you can sponsor the education fee for a girl. Likewise you can also sponsor full expense of a child residing in USA or anywhere in the world.
Ok That  sounds  great !  How do I go about  donating ?
Thank you. You have made a great decision. As I said before you can donate directly from your task payment. You can select any amount you like from your task money.
Is there a link that you can give so I can get a little  more information ?
Sure. Here is the link to our website.  URL
Oh  wow you do a lot of different things ! You should be proud!
Thank you. It would be impossible without support from people like you.
ok  time for me to donate  .. send me there , Thanks
